## Implementation Details

### Forecast Configuration
- Company-scoped configuration with sensible defaults
- Configurable lookback period (default: 30 days)
- Configurable safety stock days (default: 7 days)
- Excludable transaction types (default: initial, adjustment)

### Consumption Rate Algorithm
- Aggregates negative quantity changes from approved transactions
- Respects company-configured lookback window
- Excludes specified transaction types (initial, adjustment by default)
- Supports both single-component and batch operations

### Runout Date Calculation
- Pure function for testability
- Handles edge cases: zero/negative consumption, zero/negative inventory
- Returns null for infinite runway scenarios

### Reorder Recommendation Logic
- Based on lead time + safety days
- Calculates recommended quantity using daily consumption
- Determines optimal reorder date based on runout projection
- Handles past reorder dates by setting to today
